data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The goal was to provide a simple, effective base class that has
    provides the minimum of functionality required to create an
    inheritance-driven object hierarchy, without having to write the
    template constructor code over and over again.

    After seeing discussion of Ruby honoring __init__, I combined some
    experience from a previous employer with that theory to create this
    module. I did not provide accessors for the default hash as I felt
    this a step too far; this class's goal is create objects, not
    rewrite the namespace.
